name: places/ChIJLaKILPBZwokRmqMEPKt0R68
formattedAddress: 75 Varick St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 75 Varick St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
Great flavors, attitude and info.
All around, very solid spot

Just to add a bit more. On my return visit I wish I could give more stars. It’s a hub of amazing people (both staff and guests) who share passion about coffee and every part of human life that intersects it. Thanks guys!

text.text:
Great flavors, attitude and info.
All around, very solid spot

Just to add a bit more. On my return visit I wish I could give more stars. It’s a hub of amazing people (both staff and guests) who share passion about coffee and every part of human life that intersects it. Thanks guys!

originalText.text: Awesome crew, fantastic multi-roaster cafe. When I was last here they had a variety of Black & White, Onyx, Junto, and Loveless options. Would definitely stop again if I was anywhere close.

text.text: Awesome crew, fantastic multi-roaster cafe. When I was last here they had a variety of Black & White, Onyx, Junto, and Loveless options. Would definitely stop again if I was anywhere close.

originalText.text: Excellent coffee. Espresso on the strong side. Beautiful setting in lobby of fancy office building.

text.text: Excellent coffee. Espresso on the strong side. Beautiful setting in lobby of fancy office building.

originalText.text:
One of very few places in NYC where you can get a really quality pour over. I ordered the Juan Peña roasted by Anomalous coffee. It was a banger.

The retail selection is really good. Assembly, Black and White, Onyx, Blind Tiger, Loveless Coffee, and more. They even have some of the Black and White Black Label for retail sale.

text.text:
One of very few places in NYC where you can get a really quality pour over. I ordered the Juan Peña roasted by Anomalous coffee. It was a banger.

The retail selection is really good. Assembly, Black and White, Onyx, Blind Tiger, Loveless Coffee, and more. They even have some of the Black and White Black Label for retail sale.

originalText.text:
I recently stumbled upon a small coffee bar tucked away in the heart of our university, and I must say, it was an absolute delight! With just a few seats and an intimate ambiance, this hidden gem exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Here's why I highly recommend it:

First and foremost, the coffee served here is simply outstanding. The moment I took my first sip of their cold brew, I was blown away by its rich and smooth flavour. It was the perfect balance of boldness and subtle sweetness. Whether you're a coffee connoisseur or just a casual drinker, you're bound to appreciate the quality and craftsmanship that goes into their brews.
Their matcha was pretty good too!

What truly sets this coffee bar apart, however, is the exceptional service provided by the young, cool lads who work here. They are not only knowledgeable about their craft but also genuinely passionate about creating an enjoyable experience for their customers. Their polite and friendly demeanor makes you feel instantly welcome, and their dedication to delivering top-notch service is commendable. They should be proud of the welcoming vibe they create.

Although the coffee bar is small and cozy, it does not compromise on comfort. The few available seats are comfortable and well-maintained, allowing you to relax and savor your cup of joe. The intimate setting fosters a sense of connection, making it an ideal spot for studying, catching up with friends, or simply taking a break from the bustling university environment.

However, it's important to note that due to its size, this coffee bar does not have toilet facilities available. While this might be a minor inconvenience, it is understandable given the limited space they have. As a customer, I didn't find it to be a major issue, but it's worth considering if you require immediate restroom access. (I now saw they have two other locations)

In conclusion, if you're searching for a fantastic cup of coffee in a cool and inviting atmosphere, this small coffee bar is the place to be. The excellent coffee, combined with the exceptional service from the friendly and knowledgeable staff, creates an experience that is sure to leave you impressed! So grab a seat (if you can), indulge in their heavenly cold brew, and enjoy the delightful ambiance of this university coffee haven
